svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/27.0.9 Chrome/134.0.6998.205 Electron/35.4.0 Safari/537.36" version="27.0.9"> <diagram id="C5RBs43oDa-KdzZeNtuy" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="1042" dy="626" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-0" value="<font><b>class Bot</b></font><div>(основная работа с данными и потоками)</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="200" width="370" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-1" value="<b>class Main</b><div>(запуск бота)</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="230" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-3" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-0" target="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="390" y="350" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="440" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-4" value="<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><pre style="color: rgb(8, 8, 8); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><span style="color:#000000;">String </span><span style="color:#00627a;">getBotUsername</span>() - получает имя юзера</pre><pre style="font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><pre style="color: rgb(8, 8, 8); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><span style="color:#000000;">String </span><span style="color:#00627a;">getBotToken</span>() - получает токен бота</pre><pre style="color: rgb(8, 8, 8); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><span style="color:#0033b3;">void </span><span style="color:#00627a;">onUpdateReceived</span>() - вызывается, когда бот </pre><pre style="color: rgb(8, 8, 8); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;">получает новое соо от юзера, создается поток</pre><pre style="font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><pre style="font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 51, 179);">void </span><span style="color: rgb(0, 98, 122);">processNumber() - </span><span style="color: rgb(0, 98, 122);"><font style="color: rgb(51, 0, 0);">вычисление квадрата числа потока</font></span></pre><pre style="font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 98, 122);">void sendMessage() - </span><span style="color: rgb(0, 98, 122);"><font style="color: rgb(51, 0, 0);">отправка ответа на запрос юзера</font></span></pre></pre><pre style="color: rgb(8, 8, 8); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><br></pre></pre><pre style="color: rgb(8, 8, 8); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace;"><br></pre></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="320" width="370" height="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-5" value="<div style="background-color:#ffffff;color:#080808"><pre style="font-family:'JetBrains Mono',monospace;font-size:9,8pt;"><span style="color:#000000;">Bot bot </span>= <span style="color:#0033b3;">new </span>Bot()<br></pre></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="290" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-12" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-7" target="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-0"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gjTo5iZhDdYI8AdtYFQn-7" value="<b>class&nbsp;</b><span style="font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, monospace; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><b>TelegramLongPollingBot</b><br>(абстрактный класс для работы с тгботом)</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="125" y="40" width="220" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 368px; height: 1px; padding-top: 220px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
